alert.note: Alert for Lipscomb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 05 at 5:40PM CDT until July 05 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN LIPSCOMB AND NORTHWESTERN HEMPHILL COUNTIES... At 539 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles north of Canadian to 4 miles east of Lora, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Canadian and Glazier. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
